description: Variation of condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission dated 28th April 2020 (RN:19/08283/FULL) for the Variation of condition 1 (approved drawings and reports) of planning permission (RN: 17/11306/FULL) for the Extensions to the existing building at roof, ground and lower ground level in connection with the provision of 961sqm (GEA) Class D1 floorspace and 9 residential flats (Class C3), together with associated parking) from RN:19/08283/FULL. Namely, amendments to the proposed materials including glazed brick to render within the lightwell, curved brick to straight brick to the area of curved elevation, bronze windows to powder coated aluminium windows and slate plinth to dark Portland stone plinth and amendments to the proposed roof including changes to the design of the link corridor roof, structural glass to curtain walling at the link corridor and a raise of the roof level where it must accommodate an existing stone architrave.
